item.title: Attack Option

item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

That interface is for the Duel Arena its the Battle axe.

i am pretty sure it is this method but i don’t know how to expand it

} else if (!inWild() && !inDuelArena()){
                        getPA().showOption(3, 0, "View shop", 1);

to something like this maybe

} else if (!inCwGame() && !inWild() && !inDuelArena()){
                        getPA().showOption(3, 0, "View shop", 1);

item.title: Attack Option
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Well i recently added Castle Wars and i added this in Client.java

} else if (inCwGame || inPits) {
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

but it doesn’t show it shows the “viewShop” option which i added myself

and here is the wild and duel arena which works perfect

getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		} else if (!inWild() && !inDuelArena()){
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "View shop", 1);
		} else if (inDuelArena()) {
			getPA().walkableInterface(201);
			if(duelStatus == 5) {
				getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
			} else {
				getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1);
			}

Read full topic
